message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"Sunday","sentence":"今天是星期日。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image showing a bright, clear Sunday with a sun in the sky, a cheerful person at home looking out the window, and a visible calendar with the day marked as Sunday. The mood should be peaceful and optimistic, with faded urban ruins in the background suggesting the passage of time, but the focus remains on the warmth and calm of the present Sunday. Soft colors and gentle lighting.","sentence_translation":"Today is Sunday."}
